name: Star Symphony
overview: Symphonia Kingdom is approaching, a musical epic too grand. The birth of a MUSIC R.P.G. that no one knew about. To save it, the legendary hero Rufino Leon must find the leftover instrument. The phantom symphony "Star Symphony". Command energy and live energy are given to each of them for dramatic flourish. He said he had to perform in front of Princess Rana. Musician and righteous warrior Lester must create the first movement, which will be a trip to another dimension colored by fear, It's about to start now....
